description: ClickMonitorDDC is a lightweight utility that permits you to quickly adjust the contrast and brightness of your DDC compliant monitor directly from the systray.
pre_install: if (!(Test-Path "$persist_dir\ClickMonitorDDC.xml")) { Set-Content -Encoding ASCII -Path "$dir\ClickMonitorDDC.xml" -Value '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><settings ClickMonitorDDC="7.2"><set autostart="N"></set><set additional="Y"></set></settings>' }
